name: The Secluded Luxury Domaine
description:
DESCRIPTION
This exceptional property oozes elegance and is located in an ancient Hamlet in the community of Gordes dating back to the 1600s, when it was founded for agricultural purpose.
The Domaine offers a peaceful and tranquil setting off the beaten tourist path and is located perfectly to explore the famous Provence, with its infinite rolling hills, lavender fields, wineries, medieval towns and cultural centres.
The domaine centres around two quiet inner courtyards next to a Provencal garden with a beautiful heated pool, creating the perfect backdrop for a sophisticated cocktail reception as the sun sets, creating beautiful golden light, perfect for those picture-perfect wedding shots.
Let our garden be a gentle assault to your smelling buds. From the classic Provencal herbs such as Thyme and Rosemary to the omnipresent intense aroma of Lavender and local Jasmine, the olfactive mixture will put you in a relaxed state of mind and create a lasting emotional imprint into your memory.
On offer is all the comfort you would expect for an exquisite experience.
Before and after the big day, get your tan on the sun terrace around the pool, take a nap under an olive tree or sink into a comfy lounge furniture in the shaded courtyards and let your thoughts drift away. Get your game on the petanque court over an aperitif, enjoy a home-cooked meal full of those world known Provencal flavours, watch a movie in our outdoor lounge or gather around the open fire place under the starry sky.
The property consists of several buildings that are arranged around 2 courtyards and linked through several century old stone arches. The property is setup on a large garden terrain, which we have defined into various zones of activity and tranquility. We replanted the garden, added an olive grove on a wild flower prairie, some fruit trees and a green lawn and refined the pool and breakfast terraces. We further added a petanque court, an open fireplace, various seating and lounge areas and a secure parking lot for your comfort.
Our wedding packages include 3 night stay and daily breakfast for 14 people.
Guest area descriptions
The Salon - An indoor seating area and media equipped library to spend time with your guests, to read, to play games or to watch a movie.
The Exterior Courtyard - Features a seating area in a shaded environment to relax. Ranking Jasmine on the wall of the courtyard will activate your senses through its fragrant flowers.
The Breakfast Terrace - Fitted out with individual small tables this is a place to sit, meet, play a game or just hang out when it’s not the time to enjoy our home made breakfasts.
The Pool Terrace - Lounge chairs, parasols, and comfort beds. The pool is awaiting you, heated at a constant 28ºC / 82ºF around the clock.
The Petanque Terrain - We can always organize tournaments if you get ambitious!
The Garden Lounge - A quiet space. For sunbathers, yoga classes or massage (if you prefer the outdoor setting over the comfort of your
room)
The Superior Room:
King size bed, separable into two single beds. Comfort mattress, pillow menu, luxury bed linens, air conditioning / heating, large closet, Wi-Fi.
Walk-in rain shower, old style bath tub, towels & bathrobes, towel heater, hair dryer, bathroom amenities.
The Suites:
Featuring a salon, a bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, One level or split-level arrangement. Seating area. Queen size bed. Comfort mattress, pillow menu, luxury bed linens, air conditioning / heating, closet space, Wi-Fi. Walk-in rain shower, towels & bathrobes, towel heater, hair dryer, bathroom amenities.
The Gites (Loft / Apartement / Studio):
Featuring fully equipped kitchens, a salon or dining, a bedroom and a private bathroom. Some with independent entry and/or panoramic views and/or a private outdoor terrace.
Unit features: Seating and/or dining area. Queen size bed. Comfort mattress, pillow menu, luxury bed linens, air conditioning / heating, closet space, Wi-Fi. Fully equipped kitchens and cooking utensils. Some with individual washing machines.
Bathroom features: Walk-in rain shower, towels & bathrobes, towel heater, hair dryer, bathroom amenities.
If you require any further information then please do let us know and we will be more than happy to help.
